headline: Blackstone Reshapes Portfolio With Home Services And Hydrogen While Shares Slide
summary: Blackstone has finalized the acquisition of Champions Group, expanding its presence in home services. The firm has completed construction of the Magnolia Power Generating Station, its first hydrogen capable plant in the region. Blackstone is exploring an investment or acquisition of VoltaGrid, an energy infrastructure player. The firm is considering a sale of its clinical trials business, Nucleus Network.
